title: management quota
content: hi is there any management quota seats available in any branch, for cse and ece streams? if yes what are the fees and how to apply

comments.body: Students don't have such information. Please contact the management staff.Fee for management quota us 10L/yr.
Nah man last time i checked there were over 150 people on the cse waitlist plus you need 80% in boards for management
Woah 10 lpa is a lot, is there any "donation" at the beginning as well?
My overall in boards was 82.4. My pmcs average was 81.4. But my pcm average was only 77. I also got 95 in eng. Will they still give me the management seat? I already payed 12 Lakhs for the first year
